biotools.summary: snpgenie is a tool for microbial variant calling and phylogenetic analysis from raw read data. It was primarily written to be used with bacterial isolates of M. Bovis but can be applied to any relevant bacterial species.

bioschemas.name: snpgenie
bioschemas.summary: snpgenie is a tool for microbial variant calling and phylogenetic analysis from raw read data. It was primarily written to be used with bacterial isolates of M. Bovis but can be applied to any relevant bacterial species.
